Class RPCClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs5300.proj1b.rpc.RPCClient

  • public class RPCClient
extends java.lang.Object
    RPC client to handle requests for session read and write, and get view.
    Author:
    Deepthi

    • Method Detail

      • sessionReadClient

        public java.lang.String sessionReadClient(java.util.List<java.lang.String> destinationAddresses,
                                 java.lang.String sessionID,
                                 java.lang.String sessionVersionNo)
        Reads from primary and backup server, and returns found version and data(version number, expiration timestamp) for given session ID, delimited with '#'. Returns version number as -1, if the session is not found.
        Parameters:
        destinationAddresses -
        sessionID -
        sessionVersionNo -
        Returns:
        String containing found version and data delimited by '#'

      • sessionWriteClient

        public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> sessionWriteClient(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> destinationAddresses,
                                                     java.lang.String sessionID,
                                                     java.lang.String version,
                                                     java.lang.String data,
                                                     long discardTime,
                                                     int k)
        Sends the session data, version and discard time to primary and backup server
        Parameters:
        destinationAddresses -
        sessionID -
        version -
        data -
        discardTime -
        k -
        Returns:
        set of IPs responded

      • getView

        public java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> getView()
        Returns view of the given server. Returns empty list if there is no successful response
        Parameters:
        - - ipAddress - Server's ip address, for which the view is requested
        Returns:
        - Requested view
